text: Wo zheyang paiqian ni qu jiaohua yige minzu, zai zhege minzu zhiqian you xuduo minzu que yi shiqule, yibian ni dui tamen xuandu wo suo qishi gei ni de jingdian, tamen shi bu xin zhiren zhu de. Ni shuo:“Ta shi wo de zhu, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi yi ta wei guiyi.”
